job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtwhy join usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggteach year students drop out of higher ed for financial reasons and of lowincome students who are admitted to college never enroll because they dont know how to pay for it these young adults need access to simple mobile and personalized financial support you can help us remove cost as a barrier to educationltbrgtltbrgtwe dont have twirling slides into ball pits or roving massage therapists but the culture here is paramount we work hard to keep it healthy you will feel supported and liberated to do your best work here and youll have a lifechanging impact on the lives of millions of students in a highgrowth saas company if that sounds refreshing read onltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat were looking forltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwere looking for full stack enthusiasts who are comfortable tackling endtoend and enjoy building products that solve big problems and delight customers were a collaborative team who knows how to get things done lone rangers need not apply we believe that small teams focused on shipping software move the fastest and make the most impact the ideal candidate for this position has extensive back end skills ruby or go postgresql or mongodb aws is a plus paired with solid web skills javascript andor typescript css react is a plusltbrgtltbrgtyou bring discipline and care to implementation practices you are familiar with agilescrum processes practice common design patterns embrace clean coding principles write automated tests and employ many other techniques to bring a high level of software craftsmanship to your finished product you see regular code reviews as opportunities to learn from and educate your talented peers and youre excited to constructively participate you will do a combination of pair programming and solo programming to accomplish tasks as a senior engineer you will also conduct mentoring sessions with other engineers to help them improve their own technical skillsltbrgtltbrgtwe iterate quickly with an emphasis on lean development you will see your work have an immediate scaled impact every dayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtyou will create maintain and optimize source code for large web service and web applications using the above technologies you will also be called upon to help design and build new product for an aggressive growth driven roadmapltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtin additionltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtparticipate end to end in the product life cycle requirements refinement solution design development testing and implementation ltligtltligtparticipate in application design discussions with architects product owners and designers to further the development of the campuslogic platform ltligtltligtwork with team members to design solutions that are supported by the architecture of the existing systems ltligtltligtrapidly fix bugs incorporate customer feedback and solve problems ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtrequired skills and experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt years of experience in software development ltligtltligtexperience should include backend development ruby or go microservices architecture is a plus ltligtltligtshould be very familiar with mvc web api and developing single page applications ltligtltligt years experience in web based frontend development javascript typescript css react is a plus ltligtltligtworking knowledge of sql and relational databases including postgresql ltligtltligtshould be familiar with the dom dom manipulation and the ins and outs of asynchronous web development including a strong javascript skillset ltligtltligtan
